Hi Erik,

> http://dret.typepad.com/dretblog/2012/03/resource-profiles.html=
 is a
> brief blog post about my plan to write up a I-D proposing a "profil=
e"
> link relation type for the IANA registry. any comments on that idea
> =
would be highly appreciated, and if there is more support than
> pushback,
=
> then i expect to publish a first version within a week or two.

While I l=
ike the idea per se, I don't think it's a good idea to repeat the "mistake"=
 of XML to use HTTP URIs for things that are not supposed to be dereference=
d. Why do you? Either create a new URI scheme for that or provide some usef=
ul information - e.g. a HTML page describing the profile or just a page lin=
king to the profile's description.


--
Markus Lanthaler
@markuslanthaler
